creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: large, semi-circular pendant with scalloped edges and open work motifs; motifs include two large dragons, and two lions with balls between each pair; floral and foliate motifs surround animals; edges have three bands of dots around the open work, center band larger than side bands; attached to neck chain with butterfly motifs; 23 smaller pendants having from large pendant; alternating small pendants with butterfly-like shape and three attached cone shapes with longer chain having circle with center star shape and three attached balls
title: Necklace
